about_the_game:
Dear friend!
Have you ever dreamt about being in a fairytale and feeling like one of the characters?! You can go on a trip to the world of Fairytale at any time!
We have collected for you magic soundtracks, which will help to feel the atmosphere of magic and magic.

List of soundtracks that will lead you into a fairy tale:
RR GP 001 - 02:35 - journey through the mysterious forest and mystical village
RR GP 002 - 02:34 - the secret of the depths of the lake with real mermaids
RR GP 003 - 02:53 - the first victory over the Gray Avengers
RR GP 004 - 02:57 - The Castle of the Evil Queen
RR Map - 01:57 - the main musical theme of the game, it is used on the map
RR MM - 02:16 - soundtrack from which the adventure begins in this fairy tale

Note:
All soundtrack are in the format ogg
Album's soundtrack will be placed in a folder containing the game Picross Fairytale - nonogram: Red Riding Hood secret.
